properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 1:45PM PST until February 3 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and ice expected. Total snow accumulations of a
dusting to an inch or two at 3500 feet with local amounts of up
to 5 inches at the higher elevations. Some roads could become
glazed with black ice.

* WHERE...The Kern county mountains above 3500 feet.

* WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to midnight PST Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, travel delays and
possible road closures along with strong, gusty winds.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways impacted include Interstate 5 over
the Grapevine and Highway 58 through Tehachapi Pass.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST SUNDAY NIGHT
